message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm interested, but $110 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  How about $105?  That's still a fair price for both of us.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of 115. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Alice, I'm still really interested in this product, but $115 is just a little too high for my budget.  I'm happy to meet you halfway at $110.  That would be a fair price for both of us.
I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make a slight concession. How about we meet at 112? I think it's a fair compromise that still reflects the value of the product.
